EmailTemplate.name: Your iCompliance document request - completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Your iCompliance document request - completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Ref: {!Case.CaseNumber}
We have received confirmation from the product team that the document has been successfully processed.
If you have any questions or queries, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
